impact-statement: Gene knockdown experiments in fruit fly pupae reveal the role of the signaling molecule 'dFrizzled2' in the development of a neural circuit that helps insects to fly continuously for extended periods.

competing-interest.conf1: The authors declare that no competing interests exist.
